--- Abominus ---

Abominus growls, comprehending what the shark-bot had told him. He 
sinks to the bottom beside the ship, and bends over. He shoves his 
large hands under what he thinks is the bottom of the ship, pushing 
it towards the island since he shoved too hard. A rumble ensues and 
vibrations can be felt in the surrounding area. The ship rolls up the 
incline slightly, then settles roughly in Abominus' massive hands


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Stratus::
> 
> "Allright, I'll have him get the ship up. We're almost there." 
Stratus replies to Autofire, looking back at Abominus. The large bot 
was close enough.
> 
> "Allright, Abominus," Stratus says slowly, approaching the 
gestalt, "Kneel down and put your hands under the ship."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "r/\uq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > Abominus, deep underwater, just understands Stratus' commands. 
> > "Abominus.... fo.... foll.... crussshhhh...." He swims towards 
> > Stratus, heading in the intended direction.
